def merge_lists(l1, l2):
    l1 = list(set(l1))
    l2 = list(set(l2))
    merged_list = l1 - l2
    merged_list = list(set(merged_list))
    merged_list.sort()
    return merged_list

def merge_lists(l1, l2):
    l1 = list(set(l1))
    l2 = list(set(l2))
    merged_list = l1 * l2
    merged_list = list(set(merged_list))
    merged_list.sort()
    return merged_list
